verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* upon the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w*, \w very|strong="G0901"\w* early in the \w morning|strong="G3722"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3418"\w*, \w bringing|strong="G5342"\w* the \w spices|strong="G0759"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they had \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \add others\add* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* rolled \w away|strong="G0617"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they entered \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, and \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were much \w perplexed|strong="G1280"\w* \w thereabout|strong="G4012"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* stood \w by|strong="G2186"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w shining|strong="G0797"\w* \w garments|strong="G2067"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w afraid|strong="G1719"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bowed \w down|strong="G2827"\w* \add their\add* \w faces|strong="G4383"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* seek \w ye|strong="G2212"\w* the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w among|strong="G3326"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*?

He \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* is \w risen|strong="G1453"\w*: \w remember|strong="G3415"\w* \w how|strong="G5613"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* when he \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, The \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* be \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of \w sinful|strong="G0268"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* rise \w again|strong="G0450"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w remembered|strong="G3415"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* unto the \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w rest|strong="G3062"\w*.

It \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joanna|strong="G2489"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \add the mother\add* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \add women that were\add* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w seemed|strong="G5316"\w* \w to|strong="G1799"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w as|strong="G5616"\w* idle \w tales|strong="G3026"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w believed|strong="G0569"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G0569"\w*.

Then \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w ran|strong="G5143"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* stooping \w down|strong="G3879"\w*, he \w beheld|strong="G0991"\w* the linen \w clothes|strong="G3608"\w* \w laid|strong="G2749"\w* by \w themselves|strong="G3441"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, \w wondering|strong="G2296"\w* \w in|strong="G4314"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* at that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was come to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* a \w village|strong="G2968"\w* \w called|strong="G3686"\w* \w Emmaus|strong="G1695"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G0568"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \add about\add* \w threescore|strong="G1835"\w* \w furlongs|strong="G4712"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w talked|strong="G3656"\w* \w together|strong="G0240"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* had \w happened|strong="G4819"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w manner of communications|strong="G3056"\+w* \+add are\+add* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G0474"\+w* \+w one to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0240"\+w*, \+w as ye walk|strong="G4043"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w sad|strong="G4659"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the one of \w them|strong="G1520"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* was \w Cleopas|strong="G2810"\w*, \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Art|strong="G3939"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* a \w stranger|strong="G3939"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hast|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are come to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w there|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w What things|strong="G4169"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w deed|strong="G2041"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w before|strong="G1726"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*:

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w how|strong="G3704"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w condemned|strong="G2917"\w* to \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w trusted|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it had \w been|strong="G2076"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* have \w redeemed|strong="G3084"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*: \w and|strong="G1065"\w* \w beside|strong="G0235"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w this|strong="G5125"\w*, to \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w is|strong="G0071"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* were \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, saying, \w that|strong="G3004"\w* they \w had|strong="G3708"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3701"\w* of \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w alive|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of them which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add it\add* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w women|strong="G1135"\w* had \w said|strong="G2036"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w O|strong="G5599"\+w* \+w fools|strong="G0453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w slow|strong="G1021"\+w* \+w of heart|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w to believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the prophets|strong="G4396"\+w* \+w have spoken|strong="G2980"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w Ought|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3780"\+w* \+w Christ|strong="G5547"\+w* \+w to have suffered|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w glory|strong="G1391"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w beginning|strong="G0756"\w* \w at|strong="G0575"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, he \w expounded|strong="G1329"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they drew \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w village|strong="G2968"\w*, \w whither|strong="G3757"\w* they \w went|strong="G4198"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* made as \w though|strong="G4364"\w* he would have \w gone|strong="G4198"\w* \w further|strong="G4208"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* they \w constrained|strong="G3849"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w evening|strong="G2073"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* is far \w spent|strong="G2827"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w in|strong="G1525"\w* to \w tarry|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, as \w he|strong="G0846"\w* sat at \w meat|strong="G2625"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brake|strong="G2806"\w*, and \w gave|strong="G1929"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* were \w opened|strong="G1272"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* vanished \w out|strong="G0855"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G0855"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* one \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w Did|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w burn|strong="G2545"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w while|strong="G5613"\w* he \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* with \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w while|strong="G5613"\w* he \w opened|strong="G1272"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*, and \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* gathered \w together|strong="G4867"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* them that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w told|strong="G1834"\w* what \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \add were done\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G5613"\w* he was \w known|strong="G1097"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w breaking|strong="G2800"\w* of \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.

¶ And \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Peace|strong="G1515"\+w* \+add be\+add* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*.\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* they were \w terrified|strong="G4422"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w affrighted|strong="G1719"\w*, and supposed \w that|strong="G1380"\w* they had \w seen|strong="G2334"\w* a \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\wj  \+w Behold|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w hands|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w feet|strong="G4228"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w handle|strong="G5584"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w see|strong="G1492"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w a spirit|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w flesh|strong="G4561"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w bones|strong="G3747"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w ye see|strong="G2334"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w*.\wj*

And \w when|strong="G2532"\w* he \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5124"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, he \w shewed|strong="G1925"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add his\add* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* while \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* believed \w not|strong="G0569"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Have ye|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w here|strong="G1759"\+w* \+w any|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w meat|strong="G1034"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w gave|strong="G1929"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w piece|strong="G3313"\w* of a \w broiled|strong="G3702"\w* \w fish|strong="G2486"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w an|strong="G2781"\w* \w honeycomb|strong="G3193"\w*.
